subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jim Thome hit a two-run homer to match Mickey Mantle for 14th place with 536 career home runs, and Chicago beat the Boston Red Sox to end a three-game losing streak.
snippet: Jim Thome hit a two-run homer to match Mickey Mantle for 14th place with 536 career home runs, and Chicago beat the Boston Red Sox to end a three-game losing streak.
